医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
黑巧克力可降低高血压风险：最新研究的好消息研究发现黑巧克力的摄入量可以显着降低原发性高血压的风险，这表明对心血管健康有有益的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Dark-chocolate-cuts-hypertension-risk-Sweet-news-from-latest-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240112/Dark-chocolate-cuts-hypertension-risk-Sweet-news-from-latest-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78026531-a002-4953-b0c7-e0cf625ab33a Fri, 12 Jan 2024 00:45:00 -0500 Dark chocolate cuts hypertension risk: Sweet news from latest study
绿色环保可降低新冠病毒 (COVID-19) 风险：植物性饮食可将风险降低高达 41%研究发现，与肉类饮食相比，植物性饮食可将 COVID-19 风险降低 39-41%，并且还与更健康的 BMI 和更低的肥胖率相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Going-green-reduces-COVID-risk-Plant-based-diets-slash-risk-by-up-to-4125.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Going-green-reduces-COVID-risk-Plant-based-diets-slash-risk-by-up-to-4125.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e29102f5-c5a3-4113-a330-627bc471fd7f Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:55:00 -0500 Going green reduces COVID risk: Plant-based diets slash risk by up to 41%
大数据分析为个性化卵巢癌治疗铺平道路日本理化学研究所高级情报项目中心 (AIP) 和日本国家癌症中心研究所的 Hidenori Machino 最近领导的一项研究使用大数据多组学分析来检查人类输卵管细胞癌变时基因表达的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Big-data-analysis-paves-way-for-personalized-ovarian-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Big-data-analysis-paves-way-for-personalized-ovarian-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e341f992-e89d-48b6-91f6-9da7a47e42ab Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:39:43 -0500 Big data analysis paves way for personalized ovarian cancer treatment
研究发现，遗传学与不同社会经济群体的体重指数差异有关《国际肥胖杂志》的研究发现，遗传因素导致 BMI 的社会经济地位 (SEP) 相关差异，较低 SEP 的群体表现出较高的 BMI 增加的遗传倾向。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Genetics-linked-to-BMI-differences-across-socio-economic-groups-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Genetics-linked-to-BMI-differences-across-socio-economic-groups-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=257ef06f-c27c-404a-82fe-e6dee03fd1fe Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:24:00 -0500 Genetics linked to BMI differences across socio-economic groups, study finds
简单的生物标志物可以对儿童癌症幸存者隐藏的心脏病风险提供早期预警圣裘德终生队列研究（St. Jude LIFE）的数据显示，与高风险、无症状儿童癌症幸存者的常规临床评估相比，心脏功能和损伤的两种常见生物标志物可以更好地预测五年内的心肌病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Simple-biomarkers-offer-early-warning-of-hidden-heart-risk-in-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Simple-biomarkers-offer-early-warning-of-hidden-heart-risk-in-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=292b7e44-93e3-4f73-a6b0-9713101d7f46 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:23:47 -0500 Simple biomarkers offer early warning of hidden heart risk in childhood cancer survivors
UTEP 研究人员推出了对抗白血病和淋巴瘤的有前景的新武器德克萨斯大学埃尔帕索分校的研究人员发现了一种新型药物化合物，可以成功杀死白血病和淋巴瘤癌细胞，可能为新的治疗形式铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UTEP-researchers-unveil-promising-new-weapon-against-leukemia-and-lymphoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/UTEP-researchers-unveil-promising-new-weapon-against-leukemia-and-lymphoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a85a9859-db2e-4eb4-a56f-9af14a95dec2 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:06:58 -0500 UTEP researchers unveil promising new weapon against leukemia and lymphoma
突破性研究发现数百种与胰岛素抵抗相关的遗传标记一项针对 402,398 人的全基因组研究确定了 369 个与胰岛素抵抗相关的 SNP，为代谢疾病和潜在治疗靶点提供了见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Groundwriting-study-uncovers-hundreds-of-genic-markers-linked-to-insulin-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Groundwriting-study-uncovers-hundreds-of-genic-markers-linked-to-insulin-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ad50ae5-2b7e-46b6-9d0f-30c4f4b5813f Thu, 11 Jan 2024 23:03:00 -0500 Groundbreaking study uncovers hundreds of genetic markers linked to insulin resistance
为罕见的甲状腺髓样癌开发的有前景的 PET 扫描仪工具根据《核医学杂志》一月号发表的研究，在临床前和临床研究中发现一种新开发的 PET 显像剂可有效识别甲状腺髓样癌 (MTC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Promising-PET-scanner-tool-development-for-rare-medullary-tropical-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Promising-PET-scanner-tool-development-for-rare-medullary-tropical-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=085b36eb-07fe-41cb-858c-2f87a967d584 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:48:34 -0500 Promising PET scanner tool developed for rare medullary thyroid cancer
研究表明医护人员对 SARS-CoV-2 变异体具有持久的 T 细胞免疫力研究表明，在 Omicron 治疗后 1.5 年内，医护人员对 SARS-CoV-2 的记忆 T 细胞产生了强烈的反应，这表明对高度突变的变异体具有持久的免疫力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Study-shows- permanent-T-cell-immunity-in-healthcare-workers-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Study-shows- permanent-T-cell-immunity-in-healthcare-workers-against-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73c29dfd-c762-41a6-a658-c2335e751ff8 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:47:00 -0500 Study shows lasting T-cell immunity in healthcare workers against SARS-CoV-2 variants
新研究显示超级细菌传播不仅仅与抗生素有关研究人员首次分析了过去 20 年来英国和挪威抗生素使用对耐药细菌增加的影响。他们表明，虽然吸毒的增加放大了超级细菌的传播，但这并不是唯一的驱动因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Superbug-spread-is-not-just-about-antibiotics-new-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240111/Superbug-spread-is-not-just-about-antibiotics-new-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4a97bed-a732-47c8-9fe0-2d25934dfaf4 Thu, 11 Jan 2024 22:43:00 -0500 Superbug spread is not just about antibiotics, new study shows
